an5.253:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagatena bhikkhuna samanero upatthapetabbo.
an5.253:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekhena silakkhandhena samannagato hoti; asekhena samadhikkhandhena … asekhena pannakkhandhena … asekhena vimuttikkhandhena … asekhena vimuttinanadassanakkhandhena samannagato hoti.
an5.253:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagatena bhikkhuna samanero upatthapetabbo”ti.
